modules.description: This module manages thread metadata using Lwt thread storage, allowing threads to be named, associated with log entries, and inspected for debugging purposes. It supports operations to create and track named threads, attach status and log messages to them, and generate a summary of active threads with their recent logs and statuses. Concrete use cases include debugging concurrent applications by identifying thread origins, tracking background tasks, and inspecting thread-specific diagnostic output without requiring external logging context.
